name: Spot Specific
tag_list: mobile-apps, mobile, iphone, android, cloud, development, authoring
overview:
Spot Specific Ltd. is a software company centred around creating the best tools for creating mobile apps. The company is based in Glasgow, Scotland, UK.

The company’s core product suite, Spot Specific Apps a la Carte, is the combination of a mobile app development cloud service, a cross-platform application programming interface (API) and a versatile cross-platform runtime engine.

Together, the suite allows the authoring and development of mobile apps by anyone with basic web use skills. No programming is necessary to create native mobile applications, which currently run on iOS and Android platforms, with more to come in 2011. Apps are developed via drag-and-drop in a desktop-class web application, and are also extensible via standard web programming (via JavaScript and HTML).

Spot Specific Apps a la Carte is a subscription service. Various tiers of subscription are offered, differentiated on the number of simultaneous apps able to be published by each account type, as well as by the pre-made widgets offered.

Spot Specific is privately held, and has taken a round of funding from angel investors.

products.name: Spot Specific Apps a la Carte
